file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-21-01-02 - MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to replace the main-door frame rubber seal. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - RE- ALL 53-21-01-960-801-A ♦ PLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-21-01 Page 1 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-01-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to replace the main-door frame rubber seal. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 53-21-01-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-21-01-400-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FRAME RUBBER SEAL - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door cutout I. Replacement of the Main-Door Frame Rubber Seal SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the main-door frame rubber seal ( AMM TASK 53-21-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Discard the main-door frame rubber seal. (3) Install a new main-door frame rubber seal ( AMM TASK 53-21-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 53-21-01 Page 2 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
